msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso of col. 39 is blank

supportDesc.support: 1 papyrus ; col. 39-40: 34.3 x 29.8 cm; total size: ***

condition.ab: Col. 39: complete; cols. 36-38 cut off and missing

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Sabinus son of Sisois and Tapais grandson of Sokmenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Onnophris son of Onnophris and Thermouthis grandson of Sambas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Ptolemaios son of Esouris and Thaesis grandson of Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Dios (Deios) son of Petheus and Tapetheus grandson of Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 160)
Petaus son of Esouris and Tkollauthis grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Heras son of Onnophris and Sopas grandson of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Charidemos son of Petoraipis and Thaesis grandson of Onnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Pnepheros son of Pnepheros and Tapetheus grandson of Pnepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Petesouchos son of Hatres and Tapetheus grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Sabinus son of Petheus and Eserempis grandson of Heraklas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Kastor son of Achillas and Aphrodous grandson of Kastor (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Petaus son of Herieus and Tremenesis (Tlemenesis) grandson of Petaus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Ptolemaios son of Agathos Demon (Daimon) and Stiynchis grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Satabous son of Phaesis and Philoumene grandson of Sarapion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 226)
Ptollas son of Satabous and Tapondos (Tapontos) grandson of Ptollas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221)
Pamonneios (Pamonneouis) son of Anchorymphis and Didymarion grandson of Pamonneios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 197)
Heron son of Petheus and Taonnophris grandson of Teos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Kopaneus son of Polydion and Politta grandson of Kopaneus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184)
Herakles son of Apollonios and Tapetheus grandson of Petoraipis (Petsoraipis) (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 168)
Heron son of Sabinus and Gaia grandson of Pnepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Petesouchos son of Petheus and Tkollainis grandson of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Petoraipis (Petsoraipis) son of Hatres and Soeris grandson of Imouthes (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Sabinus son of Pasoknopaios and Tapetheus grandson of Horos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Harsiesis son of Petheus and Thatres grandson of Harsiesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 155)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
